title: Plex picks up Google TV’s best tricks w/ universal watchlist and search for streaming services
content:
There are way too many streaming services today, and with content constantly moving between them, it isn’t easy to keep track of shows and movies you want to watch. Google TV solved that problem when it launched in 2020, but now Plex is throwing its hat in the ring with similar tricks.

more…

The post Plex picks up Google TV’s best tricks w/ universal watchlist and search for streaming services appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Plex has updated its app across all platforms to adopt new discovery features and a universal watchlist, much like Google TV.
